title: The Immortal Brushstroke
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed digital painting, Fantasy Xianxia style, full vertical shot (9:16). A heroic street artist, clad in flowing dark robes and a wide straw hat, standing on wooden scaffolding. The artist is painting a massive, living mural onto a weathered red brick wall. The mural depicts a dynamic Xianxia scene: fierce, detailed Eastern dragons swirling in azure clouds, battling winged celestial warriors. Cascading waterfalls and mist elements seamlessly transition the mural into the background. A small orange fox is perched on the artist's shoulder. Background shows a vast ancient Chinese city with pagodas and temples, shrouded in soft mist under a beautiful rosy dawn sky. Dramatic perspective, intricate details, cinematic lighting.
